page.title: 09CROWLE COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: THE SCHOOL HAS INFANTS AND JUNIORS. EACH TERM THE CHILDREN CELEBRATE VARIOUS{FESTIVALS.}IN{AUTUMN}THERE IS A{HARVEST FESTIVAL.}THE INFANTS BRING GROCERIES AND PRODUCE AND HAVE SONGS AND PRAYERS TO SAY THANKS FOR GODS GIFTS. THE FOOD IS GIVEN TO THE OLD FOLK IN CROWLE. EVERY OTHER YEAR AT CHRISTMAS THE SCHOOL PRESENTS A MAJOR SHOW. EVERY CHILD TAKES PART AND THE PARENTS AND OTHER VISITORS ARE ENTERTAINED. THE CHILDREN HAVE A{ {CHRISTMAS}TEA AND{ PARTY}GAMES AND AN ENTERTAINER OR FILMS. ON{MAY DAY}THE INFANTS CHOOSE A{MAY QUEEN}AND DANCE ROUND THE{MAYPOLE.}AT{EASTER}THE CHILDREN HAVE A DECORATED{EGG} COMPETITION WITH CHOCOLATE EGGS AS PRIZES. IN THE SUMMER TERM EVERY CHILD TAKES PART IN THE JUNIOR OR INFANT{ {SPORTS}DAY. A SHIELD IS PRESENTED TO THE WINNING HOUSE TEAM.
